Text.Page:
Cold...it's so cold.

All I can think of right now is a warm bowl of Fish Soup.

I'd make it myself, but I can't leave my post to gather the necessary ingredients.

Say, if I give you the recipe, would you make some for me?
Ainve asked <PCNAME> for help making a refreshing beverage. After catching a Silver Trout, Jakren was able to brew a special beer.

I really appreciate you helping me out with that soup, and I was wondering if you'd be willing to do me another favor.

My friend Jakren is looking for some Silver Trout to brew a special beer.

I promised him I'd get some after my shift, but now that you're here we can speed the process up a bit.

Can you help us out?"Actually, I can."

Go straight north and you'll see a patch of Crane Flowers.

Silver Trout can't resist the stuff!

You got the flower!
Good work. Now, crush the flower into juice and spread it evenly over your bait.

You'll have success in no time.
You caught the Silver Trout! Now we're ready. This shouldn't take too long.

Any luck with the Silver Trout?
Just spread the juice on your bait and we'll be drinking beer in no time.

Thank me? No, thank you!

Here, have a beer!
